Keywords: Marauders , Pirate , X-Factor , X-Men
Real Name: Robert Drake
Special Powers
LIMBS FREEZE AND SHATTER: When an opposing character within 6 squares misses Iceman, give that character a Frozen Limb token. // Characters with 1+ Frozen Limb tokens modify attack -1. // When a character with a Frozen Limb token hits Iceman, remove its Frozen Limb tokens.
ICE SHELL: Barrier, Toughness, Energy Shield/Deflection.

Comments
April 19, 2021
Redrover454
LOVE this Iceman. 4 clicks of 11/3 PB with move-and-attack for 65 points is just so efficient. Soften people up with the PB, then come in next to him with his Enhancement with your next shooter to finish your target off. With his trait on top of the defense special your opponents are really gonna have a hard time taking a shot at him. He loves the no pushing dmg and IM hindering with the 2021 rule change as well, so he's an even more appealing choice now. Besides that he's a little squishy, so be sure to keep a solid front line in front of Bobby to maximize his defense special. The Plasticity/Poison and Empower is pretty nice though for punishing whoever does charge in on him. For 5 more pts than the Common Bishop of this set, if you can do without the Outwit, he's a solid shooter for your X-men.
January 18, 2021
tidge
Unless you specifically want an Iceman with more mobility or one of the other "special effects", this should pretty much be the default choice of the character for almost all teams. The ability to penalize attackers with "frozen limbs" is sure to cause second thoughts before making certain attacks which include him (e.g. Energy Explosion). This will be particularly annoying on those last two Plasticity/Poison clicks, as adjacent opposing figures will likely have no choice but to make attacks against him. The top-dial Enhancement is going to be appreciated by theme-appropriate characters, for example: Storm, Cyclops, and (hopefully) eventually Pyro.
